comments.html: I need some assistance. I was editing my vty lines (0 4) and instead of typing "line vty 0 4" I just typed "line vty 4" and now I have two lots of vty configs - 0 to 3, and a separate 1 for 4. This is really annoying. Anyone know how to condense it back into a single "0 4" section?
comments.name: Gav Owen

comments.html: Somehow this one slipped out of my Inbox. As soon as the VTY lines have identical configurations, they are merged. Change the configurations for VTY 1 and 4 back to what the others are using and you should be OK.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: so what  is the solution? because i encounter the same problem.
comments.name: james

comments.html: It's a bug. Open a case with Cisco TAC and request a fix.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
